With the Android platform fast becoming a target of malicious hackers, application security is crucial. This concise book provides the knowledge you need to design and implement robust, rugged, and secure apps for any Android device. How is the Android platform structured to handle security? What services and tools are available to help you protect data? Up until now, no single resource has provided this vital information. With this guide, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll learn how to address real threats to your app, whether or not you have previous experience with security issues.

Examine AndroidÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s architecture and security model, and how it isolates the filesystem and database
